name: Guard The Light
description:
Protect the Light of this world from the Fellowship of Darkness. Fight for your survival against hordes of enemies, don't give up and you shall be rewarded in the end...

This game has been made following BlackThornProd's course on Udemy and bringing my own touch to it: https://www.udemy.com/share/101YayAEcecVdWQ3wD/

All the assets are handmade, except the Music: Claim Of Thrones from Youtube Audio Library, and the Font: FireStarter by PizzaDude
